title: 2nd Amendment Rally Set For Washington, D.C. This Weekend
text:
Gun owners from across the country will converge on the west lawn of the U.S. Capitol on Saturday, November 2nd to rally in support of the Second Amendment and the right to keep and bear arms. I’ll be speaking there, along with today’s guest on Bearing Arms’ Cam & Co., Rob Pincus, who joins me to talk about the idea behind the rally, a few of the many speakers, and what the grassroots gathering can accomplish.

Some of my favorite folks in the world of Second Amendment advocacy will be there, and I’m looking forward to getting to see old friends and meet some activists for the very first time. There’ll be gun owners traveling from as far away as California and Washington State to attend the rally, and many of the speakers will be around beforehand and afterwards to talk with those in attendance. I’ll be sticking around until the early evening for sure, and hope to get a chance to say hello to readers of the website and fans of the show.

Also on today’s program, we have the incredible story of a Washington State man with 50 felony convictions to his name, an armed citizen in southern California, and a Jacksonville police recruit in the right place at the right time to save a woman’s life.

In addition to the link above, you can also find Bearing Arms’ Cam & Co. on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, and Townhall.com’s podcast page. Thanks for watching, listening, and spreading the word!
description: Gun owners from across the country will gather on the west lawn of the U.S. Capitol Saturday afternoon in support of the Second Amendment.
